Vivant Skincare, BP 10% Gel Medication (New Size)

Brand: Vivant

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Active Ingredient: Benzoyl Peroxide 10.00%

Inactive Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide

Directions: Apply to affected areas with fingertips and allow skin to absorb the ointment.

Inactive Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide

Directions: Apply to affected areas with fingertips and allow skin to absorb the ointment.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
